meanings.sent1: The consequences of his inactions were severe.
meanings.sent2: Her inactions during the crisis caused more harm than good.
meanings.sent3: The inactions of the indecisive squirrel were quite amusing to watch.

meanings.sent5: The inactions of the driver resulted in a missed turn and a longer journey.
